definition.text: Shares are just like Backups, but the resulting file is stripped off sensitive personal information!

paragraphs.text: Get used to share Shares! This good practice will help you avoid dangerous mistakes in the future!
Read the page about Shares for more info!
Whenever you wish to share your work, never share your Workspace files or Backups. Those files may contain sensitive information such as your Exchange Account Key. Instead, share your Shares!
